inclusion.criterion: Adult patients over 18 years old with diabetes (both sexes)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: presenting without any kidney disease or with ESRD on hemodialysis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Undergoing major elective surgery procedures such as abdominal, pulmonary, GU/GYN, vascular, renal, neurologic, and orthopedic surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent for the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with elevated preoperative blood glucose of a value > 150 mg/dL or < 350 mg/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Baseline chemistry with a potassium at or above 3.5
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient does not give informed consent for the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient does not have decisional capacity or a surrogate.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient cannot understand or read English.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a preoperative blood glucose < 150 mg/dL or >350 mg/dL
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with kidney disease that are not on hemodialysis
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and is undergoing surgery. He has elevated preoperative blood glucose levels, which may be a concern.
